name: DIVER - SEA SURVIVAL SIMULATOR
description: This is a rich graphic based game where you can swim, hunt and gather as well… Abstain from the dangerous and aggressive animals, because if you go to close to us they’ll attack you! Look for the treasure chests nearby the polyps and collect them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
